title: #BecauseMiami: Rapid Fire
description:
A lot has happened since the last episode of #BecauseMiami, so Dan and Billy Corben go rapid fire with the news from both Miami and the state of Florida. Plus, investigative reporter Andy Campbell joins us to discuss the details from his new book, "We Are Proud Boys: How a Right-Wing Street Gang Ushered in a New Era of American Extremism."
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
